articles.description: Telegram Premium service users will get a higher limit for chats, media and file uploads, founder Pavel Durov said on June 10, noting that paid subscriptions would ensure the app remains funded primarily by users and not advertisers.
articles.content: The Telegram messaging app, used by a wide range of Russian and Ukrainian officials during the war, only needs a small number of paid subscribers to cover its costs, founder Pavel Durov said on Tuesd… [+786 chars]

articles.title: 'Sitting is the new smoking': Easy Yoga asanas for office if you are spending all day at desk

articles.description: On the technical charts, the RSI of the stock stood at 56.0.
